comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: My guess is this is on the beach at Jersey (Channel Islands, UK) which was used at low tide before they got a proper airfield. Flight magazine records a charter down there from Heston by BANCO for Guernsey and Jersey Airways in 1934 www.flightglobal.com/pdfarchive/view/1934/1934%20-%200483...
